title: Limits plea bargaining for misdemeanor and felony charges
summary: Limits plea bargaining for misdemeanor and felony charges; provides, in cases where the indictment charges a misdemeanor or felony, that any plea of guilty thereafter entered in satisfaction of such charge shall include at least a plea of guilty to the violation of the offense which is not less than one class lower than the class of crime which was originally charged.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to limiting plea bargaining for misdemeanor and felony charges
